home.title: Curate Seoul | Premium K-Beauty Booking & Verified Seoul Travel
home.description: Experience Seoul like a local. Book verified K-Beauty services, get your Seouler Pass, and enjoy exclusive benefits at local restaurants, cafes, and pop-ups.
home.ogDescription: Issue "Seouler Pass" exclusively for K-Beauty reservation customers. Experience the real charm of Seoul from customized local lists to partner experience group benefits.

faqSection.title: Got Questions?
faqSection.subtitle: Most frequently asked questions about Curate Seoul

q1.question: Why is a review mission included?
q1.answer: Because partner benefits are operated as a 'content-based program', and it's to share information with more travelers through honest reviews after visiting.

q2.question: How do I write a review?
q2.answer: Please write an honest review with photos (5 or more) or short videos that well reveal the atmosphere of the experience place. Passionate reviews will become a condition for promotion to 'VIP level', which allows you to receive even greater benefits on your next visit to Seoul!

q3.question: How do I book K-Beauty?
q3.answer: We provide customized proposals with selected stores through 1:1 consultation via WeChat (@CurateSeoul_helper) or consultation channels. 'Seouler Pass' will be activated immediately upon confirmation, and we will deliver a local list that fits your schedule and taste.

q4.question: How much is the deposit (booking fee)?
q4.answer: The deposit amount varies depending on the K-Beauty/experience configuration you book, and we will inform you in detail after consultation. It will be fully refunded upon completion of the review mission.

faqPage.subtitle: Check out the frequently asked questions about using Curate Seoul.
